snippet: Deron Williams said that for quite some time he thought he was going to leave for the Mavericks, but he decided to return after the Nets traded for Joe Johnson.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets star point guard Derron Williams says that for quite some time he thought he was going to leave for the Dallas Mavericks, but he decided to return after the Nets traded for six-time All-Star Joe Johnson.
lead_paragraph: Deron Williams said that for quite some time he thought he was going to leave for the Mavericks, but he decided to return after the Nets traded for Joe Johnson.

headline.seo: Nets’ Williams Was Swayed to Stay by Johnson Trade
headline.main: Bold Move Helped Sway Williams to Return to the Nets
headline.print_headline: Bold Move Helped Sway Williams to Return to Nets
